DOC.brief_summary: The purpose observer-blind study evaluate safety immunogenicity GSK Biologicals ' meningococcal vaccine GSK134612 compare Menactra® subject 10 25 year age . In addition , study compare immunogenicity two lot GSK 134612 vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study GSK Biologicals ' Meningococcal Vaccine GSK 134612 Versus Menactra® Healthy Adolescents/Adults
DOC.criteria: All subject must satisfy ALL follow criterion study entry : Subjects investigator believe and/or parent ( ) /Legally Acceptable Representative ( ) comply requirement protocol . A male female , include , 10 25 year age time vaccination . Written inform consent obtain subject/from parent Legally Acceptable Representative ( ) subject . Assent obtain subject still legally minor line local rule regulation . Healthy subject establish medical history clinical examination enter study . Previously complete routine childhood vaccination best subject's/Legally Acceptable Representative ( ) 's knowledge . Female subject nonchildbearing potential may enrol study . Female subject childbearing potential may enrol study , subject : practiced adequate contraception 30 day prior vaccination , negative pregnancy test day vaccination , agree continue adequate contraception 2 month vaccination . The following criterion check time study entry . If ANY exclusion criterion applies , subject must include study : Use investigational nonregistered product study vaccine ( ) within 30 day precede dose study vaccine , plan use study period . Chronic administration ( defined 14 day ) immunosuppressant immunemodifying drug within six month prior vaccination . ( For corticosteroid , mean prednisone < 10 mg/day , equivalent , allow . Inhaled topical steroid allow . ) Planned administration/administration vaccine foreseen study protocol within one month dose vaccine , exception license inactivated influenza vaccine . Previous vaccination meningococcal polysaccharide conjugate vaccine . Previous vaccination vaccine component within last month . History meningococcal disease . Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition , include human immunodeficiency virus infection , base medical history physical examination . A family history congenital hereditary immunodeficiency , immune competence potential vaccine recipient demonstrate . History allergic reaction disease likely exacerbate component either vaccine , dry natural rubber latex . History neurologic disorder , include GuillainBarré Syndrome . Major congenital defect serious chronic illness . Acute disease time enrollment . Administration immunoglobulins and/or blood product within three month precede dose study vaccine plan administration study period . Pregnant lactate female . History chronic alcohol consumption and/or drug abuse . Female plan become pregnant planning discontinue contraceptive precaution . Bleeding disorder , thrombocytopenia , subject anticoagulant therapy . Child care . Concurrently participate another clinical study , time study period , subject expose investigational noninvestigational product .
